mapper.sql: select notice_no, group_no, member_no, title, content, create_date, view_count from nm_notice
mapper.insert: insert into nm_notice( group_no, member_no, title, content ) values( #{groupNo}, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select:
select n.notice_no, n.member_no, n.title, n.create_date, n.view_count, p.notice_photo_no, p.notice_photo_file from nm_notice n
inner join nm_notice_photo p on n.notice_no= p.notice_no
order by n.notice_no desc
mapper.update: update nm_notice set group_no=#{groupNo}, member_no=#{memberNo}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where notice_no=#{noticeNo}
